overview:
Mr. Ton brings to NewACT a rich background in international business development and sales. Prior to founding NewACT, he served as the business manager of the Instant Messaging and Presence business unit at Comverse (Nasdaq:CMVT.PK) where he was responsible for all commercial and business development activities. Prior to joining Comverse, Rafi was VP Asia Pacific and head of Business Development at Followap, now part of NeuStar (NYSE:NSR), where he managed the expansion of Followap to Asia and formed its alliances with handset vendors, Value Added Resellers and OEM channels. Previously, Mr. Ton worked for the law offices of Eitan, Pearl, Latzer and Cohen-Zedek, specializing in intellectual property law, corporate law and venture capital investments.

Rafi holds an LLB degree from the Haifa University.
